verses.verse: וָאָשׁ֕וּב <WH7725> Then I turned וָאֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> and lifted up עֵינַ֖י <WH5869> mine eyes וָֽאֶרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> and looked וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> and behold מְגִלָּ֥ה <WH4039> roll עָפָֽה׃ <WH5774> and behold a flying

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> I רֹאֶ֑ה <WH7200> unto me What seest וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> thou? And I answered אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I רֹאֶה֙ <WH7200> I see מְגִלָּ֣ה <WH4039> roll עָפָ֔ה <WH5774> a flying אָרְכָּהּ֙ <WH753> the length עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> thereof [is] twenty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits וְרָחְבָּ֖הּ <WH7341> and the breadth עֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> thereof ten בָּאַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about זֹ֚את <WH2063> likewise הָֽאָלָ֔ה <WH423> he unto me This [is] the curse הַיּוֹצֵ֖את <WH3318> that goeth forth עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> over the face כָל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the whole earth כִּ֣י <WH3588> surely כָל־ <WH3605> everyone הַגֹּנֵ֗ב <WH1589> for every one that stealeth מִזֶּה֙ <WH2088> This כָּמ֣וֹהָ <WH3644> [as] on this side according נִקָּ֔ה <WH5352> shall be cut off וְכָל־ <WH3605> and everyone הַנִּ֨שְׁבָּ֔ע <WH7650> to it and every one that sweareth מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> one כָּמ֥וֹהָ <WH3644> [as] on that side according נִקָּֽה׃ <WH5352> shall be cut off

הוֹצֵאתִ֗יהָ <WH3318> I will bring it forth נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וּבָ֙אָה֙ <WH935> and it shall enter אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house הַגַּנָּ֔ב <WH1590> of the thief וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to בֵּ֛ית <WH1004> and into the house הַנִּשְׁבָּ֥ע <WH7650> of him that sweareth בִּשְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> by my name לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> falsely וְלָ֙נֶה֙ <WH3885> and it shall remain בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> of his house וְכִלַּ֖תּוּ <WH3615> and shall consume וְאֶת־ <WH854> for עֵצָ֥יו <WH6086> it with the timber וְאֶת־ <WH854> for אֲבָנָֽיו׃ <WH68> thereof and the stones

וַיֵּצֵ֕א <WH3318> with me went forth הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <WH4397> Then the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> that talked בִּ֑י וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me שָׂ֣א <WH5375> unto me Lift up נָ֤א <WH4994> now עֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> now thine eyes וּרְאֵ֔ה <WH7200> and see מָ֖ה <WH4100> what הַיּוֹצֵ֥את <WH3318> what [is] this that goeth forth הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> I

וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> And I said מַה־ <WH4100> What הִ֑יא <WH1931> and he וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> What [is] it? And he said זֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise הָֽאֵיפָה֙ <WH374> This [is] an ephah הַיּוֹצֵ֔את <WH3318> that goeth forth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> He said זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise עֵינָ֖ם <WH5869> moreover This [is] their resemblance בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> through all the earth

וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> behold כִּכַּ֥ר <WH3603> a talent עֹפֶ֖רֶת <WH5777> of lead נִשֵּׂ֑את <WH5375> And behold there was lifted up וְזֹאת֙ <WH2063> is a אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> woman אַחַ֔ת <WH259> and this [is] a יוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> that sitteth בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הָאֵיפָֽה׃ <WH374> of the ephah

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise הָרִשְׁעָ֔ה <WH7564> This [is] wickedness וַיַּשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <WH7993> And he cast אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> it into the midst הָֽאֵיפָ֑ה <WH374> of the ephah וַיַּשְׁלֵ֛ךְ <WH7993> and he cast אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֥בֶן <WH68> the weight הָעֹפֶ֖רֶת <WH5777> of lead אֶל־ <WH413> on פִּֽיהָ׃ <WH6310> upon the mouth ס

וָאֶשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> Then lifted I up עֵינַ֜י <WH5869> mine eyes וָאֵ֗רֶא <WH7200> and looked וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> and there שְׁתַּ֨יִם <WH8147> two נָשִׁ֤ים <WH802> women יֽוֹצְאוֹת֙ <WH3318> and behold there came out וְר֣וּחַ <WH7307> and the wind בְּכַנְפֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3671> [was] in their wings וְלָהֵ֥נָּה <WH2007> for they had כְנָפַ֖יִם <WH3671> wings כְּכַנְפֵ֣י <WH3671> like the wings הַחֲסִידָ֑ה <WH2624> of a stork וַתִּשֶּׂ֙אנָה֙ <WH5375> and they lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֵיפָ֔ה <WH374> the ephah בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> between the earth וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> and the heaven

וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> Then said אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <WH4397> I to the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> that talked בִּ֑י אָ֛נָה <WH575> Where הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> are they מֽוֹלִכ֖וֹת <WH1980> taking אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵיפָֽה׃ <WH374> ephah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me לִבְנֽוֹת־ <WH1129> unto me To build לָ֥הֿ בַ֖יִת <WH1004> it an house בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land שִׁנְעָ֑ר <WH8152> of Shinar וְהוּכַ֛ן <WH3559> and it shall be established וְהֻנִּ֥יחָה <WH3240> and set שָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there עַל־ <WH5921> her own מְכֻנָתָֽהּ׃ <WH4369> there upon her own base ס
